Title: Exclusive-Apple Supplier Foxconn Wins AirPod Order, Plans $200 Million Factory In India - Source
Description: Taiwanese contract manufacturer Foxconn has won an order to make AirPods for Apple Inc and plans to build a factory in India to produce the wireless earphones, two people with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters.

Title: IPhone maker Hon Hai expects flat 2023 as it builds EV push
Description: The Taiwanese Apple Inc. assembler offered a forecast of slumping consumer electronics demand this year offset by an uptick in sales of cloud and networking products, PCs and especially EV hardware, which it sees growing by as much as fivefold this year.
